description: Main source file for a Flutter application implementing the Blue Collar Connect app, setting up providers, app structure, navigation, and UI components.

classes.name: BlueCollarConnectRoot
classes.description: Root widget that sets up global providers for the app.

classes.name: BlueCollarConnectApp
classes.description: Main MaterialApp configuration, theme setup, and home page.

classes.name: AppRoot
classes.description: Determine initial screen based on authentication state.

classes.name: TabbedMainShell
classes.description: Main tab navigation for core features.

classes.name: JobsScreen
classes.description: Browse, search, and view details of jobs.

classes.name: JobDetailsScreen
classes.description: Detailed view of specific job, with apply functionality.

classes.name: MessagesScreen
classes.description: Messaging list, view threads, navigate to chat detail.

classes.name: ProfileScreen
classes.description: View and edit user profile information.

classes.name: CompanyDetailsScreen
classes.description: Display details about a specific company.

classes.name: ChatDetailScreen
classes.description: Chat conversation view with real message exchange.

classes.name: ChatBubble
classes.description: UI widget for individual chat messages.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the app.
